flawed_nl_solution:
A fifth of the apples have worms, so Lex has to throw 85 / 5 = <<85/5=17>>17 apples away.
Nine more have bruises than worms, so Lex has 17 + 9 = <<17+9=29>>29 apples for applesauce.
He picked 85 apples, so Lex has 85 - 29 - 17 = <<85-29-17=39>>39 apples left to eat raw.
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 29. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
